## Overview

This is an R Markdown presentation for the Shiny Application and Reproducible Pitch project.

## Data preparation

The Shiny Application is based on the iris data set, which is described as below.


## Shiny application

- This shiny application is used to predict the petal width
- Three independent variables are considered, namely, sepal length, sepal width and species
- For more details on the shiny application, please refer to the following link to app webpage:https://zsy1234.shinyapps.io/untitled_folder/
